languages.text: Сухожилия аккуратно рассечены тонким и острым лезвием, чтобы искалечить вас, но не лишить возможности двигаться окончательно. От этой травмы нельзя избавиться обычными способами
Your tendons have been carefully cut with a thin and sharp blade in order to cripple you without completely robbing you of the ability to move. Cannot be removed by regular means
languages.original_text: Сухожилия аккуратно рассечены тонким и острым лезвием, чтобы искалечить вас, но не лишить возможности двигаться окончательно. От этой травмы нельзя избавиться обычными способами

traits.locale_text: Your tendons have been carefully cut with a thin and sharp blade in order to cripple you without completely robbing you of the ability to move.
Your tendons have been carefully cut with a thin and sharp blade in order to cripple you without completely robbing you of the ability to move.

languages.text: あなたの腱は、動く能力を完全に奪うことなく、それでも自由を奪うために、薄く鋭い刃物で注意深く切られている。 通常の方法では除去できない
languages.original_text: Your tendons have been carefully cut with a thin and sharp blade in order to cripple you without completely robbing you of the ability to move. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: あなたの腱は、動く能力を完全に奪うことなく、それでも自由を奪うために、薄く鋭い刃物で注意深く切られている。 通常の方法では除去できない

languages.text: 你的筋腱被薄而锋利的手术刀小心翼翼地切开，让你基本处于瘫痪状态，却又没彻底剥夺你的移动能力。 此效果无法通过通常手段移除
languages.original_text: Your tendons have been carefully cut with a thin and sharp blade in order to cripple you without completely robbing you of the ability to move. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: 你的筋腱被薄而锋利的手术刀小心翼翼地切开，让你基本处于瘫痪状态，却又没彻底剥夺你的移动能力。

languages.text: Tus tendones han sido cortados cuidadosamente con una hoja fina y afilada para incapacitarte sin privarte por completo de la capacidad de moverte. No se puede curar por medios normales
languages.original_text: Your tendons have been carefully cut with a thin and sharp blade in order to cripple you without completely robbing you of the ability to move. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: Tus tendones han sido cortados cuidadosamente con una hoja fina y afilada para incapacitarte sin privarte por completo de la capacidad de moverte.

languages.text: Deine Sehnen wurden sorgfältig mit einer dünnen und scharfen Klinge zerschnitten worden, um dich zu verkrüppeln, ohne dich vollständig bewegungsunfähig zu machen. Kann mit normalen Mitteln nicht entfernt werden.
languages.original_text: Your tendons have been carefully cut with a thin and sharp blade in order to cripple you without completely robbing you of the ability to move. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: Deine Sehnen wurden sorgfältig mit einer dünnen und scharfen Klinge zerschnitten worden, um dich zu verkrüppeln, ohne dich vollständig bewegungsunfähig zu machen.

languages.text: Vos tendons ont été soigneusement incisés à l'aide d'une lame fine et tranchante afin de vous estropier sans pour autant empêcher tout mouvement. Impossible à supprimer par des méthodes ordinaires.
languages.original_text: Your tendons have been carefully cut with a thin and sharp blade in order to cripple you without completely robbing you of the ability to move. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: Vos tendons ont été soigneusement incisés à l'aide d'une lame fine et tranchante afin de vous estropier sans pour autant empêcher tout mouvement.

languages.text: Tendonların; uzuvlarının hareket kabiliyetini kaybetmeyeceği bir biçimde, ince ve keskin bir bıçakla dikkatlice kesildi.
languages.original_text: Your tendons have been carefully cut with a thin and sharp blade in order to cripple you without completely robbing you of the ability to move. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: Uzvunu hareket kabiliyetini tamamen elinden almadan kesmek için ince ve keskin bir bıçakla tendonların dikkatlice kesiliyor.

languages.text: Your tendons have been carefully cut with a thin and sharp blade in order to cripple you without completely robbing you of the ability to move. Can't be removed by normal means.
